name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Exclusive!
On July 19, after the student abuse incident at Hengshui No. 2 Middle School was exposed, Hengshui No. 2 Middle School urgently held an internal parent gag meeting
It said that it hoped that parents would consider the overall situation. The current situation is that foreign forces are eyeing China's basic education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Parents who do not enter the meeting will be kicked out of the group directly

Netizen contribution
On July 20, netizens said that during the Chengdu Universiade, the most stringent express delivery ban in Sichuan's history was implemented
Liquids, nail clippers, eyebrow razors, leaves, cereals, feed, books, etc. are not allowed to be received or sent during the Games.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 20, Xi'an, in front of the Provincial Education Department.
Xi'an parents' protest against "high school entrance exam migration" continues.
During the protest, protesting parents clashed with the police.
Two mothers were carried away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 20, Xi'an, in front of the Provincial Education Department
Face the violent enforcement of laws against parents, netizens are outraged

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that the reason for controlling the song "Stars Lighting Up the Sky" is that starting from July 19, parents in Xi'an began to use this song on TikTok to express their dissatisfaction.

It was said that the fire was suspected to be caused by a new energy vehicle and has been extinguished.

During the Chengdu Universiade, off-campus access to various systems including the financial portal will be closed, and mobile phone access will also be restricted to on-campus access.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
July 20th is the second anniversary of the 7.20 rainstorm in Zhengzhou.
"At the flooded subway station Shakou Station on Line 5, a large number of citizens presented flowers, but this year they were not allowed to do so. Staff at the entrance stopped people from holding flowers and rushed forward to snatch them.
Currently, all four entrances are empty, and there are no bouquets at the door.
I secretly placed this bouquet of flowers in a nearby park."
